p.span: The primary reference for configuring initial implementation, data model extensions, and user interface (PCF) files for GenericCenter. The intended readers are all IT staff and configuration engineers.

shortdesc.ph: The primary reference for configuring initial implementation, data model extensions, and user interface (PCF) files for GenericCenter. The intended readers are all IT staff and configuration engineers.

shortdesc.p: Using Advanced Product Designer (APD), you can go from prototyping a product to visualizing the product within PolicyCenter™. Finally, you can turn this visualization into an installed product for use in production.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Using Advanced Product Designer (APD), you can go from prototyping a product to visualizing the product within PolicyCenter. Finally, you can turn this visualization into an installed product for use in production.

topic.title: Conceptualizing insurance products with XMind mind maps

topicmeta.navtitle: Conceptualizing insurance products with XMind mind maps
topicmeta.linktext: Conceptualizing insurance products with XMind mind maps

topic.title: Labels on product and product line

topicmeta.navtitle: Labels on product and product line
topicmeta.linktext: Labels on product and product line

shortdesc.p: Guidewire provides XMind markers to tag the elements of your map that are part of the product model and visualization. Use these instructions to import the Guidewire markers into XMind.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Guidewire provides XMind markers to tag the elements of your map that are part of the product model and visualization. Use these instructions to import the Guidewire markers into XMind.

topic.title: Create mind map with product or product line

shortdesc.p: XMind provides a blank canvas on which you can model your product structure. At a minimum, the mind map must contain a product or product line.

topicmeta.navtitle: Create mind map with product or product line
topicmeta.linktext: Create mind map with product or product line
topicmeta.shortdesc: XMind provides a blank canvas on which you can model your product structure. At a minimum, the mind map must contain a product or product line.

topic.title: Display and customize the XMind legend

shortdesc.p: The XMind legend displays the markers used in the current map. You can replace the default marker descriptions with your own descriptions.

topicmeta.navtitle: Display and customize the XMind legend
topicmeta.linktext: Display and customize the XMind legend
topicmeta.shortdesc: The XMind legend displays the markers used in the current map. You can replace the default marker descriptions with your own descriptions.

topic.title: Navigate to the Visualized Products tab

shortdesc.p: On the Visualized Products tab on the Product Management screen, you can view the details of each product. You can also edit, update, and view submissions for each product.

topicmeta.navtitle: Navigate to the Visualized Products tab
topicmeta.linktext: Navigate to the Visualized Products tab
topicmeta.shortdesc: On the Visualized Products tab on the Product Management screen, you can view the details of each product. You can also edit, update, and view submissions for each product.

topic.title: Create visualized product from mind map

shortdesc.p: Using APD, create a visualized product by selecting Import From XMind to import an XMind mind map into PolicyCenter.

topicmeta.navtitle: Create visualized product from mind map
topicmeta.linktext: Create visualized product from mind map
topicmeta.shortdesc: Using APD, create a visualized product by selecting Import From XMind to import an XMind mind map into PolicyCenter.

topic.title: Create visualized product directly in APD

shortdesc.p: If you do not have access to XMind, you can create a visualized product directly in APD, without starting from a mind map.

topicmeta.navtitle: Create visualized product directly in APD
topicmeta.linktext: Create visualized product directly in APD
topicmeta.shortdesc: If you do not have access to XMind, you can create a visualized product directly in APD, without starting from a mind map.

topic.title: Create visualized product from XML template

shortdesc.p: You can export a visualized product to an XML template. Use these steps to import an XML template from a visualized product defined in another instance of GenericCenter.

topicmeta.navtitle: Create visualized product from XML template
topicmeta.linktext: Create visualized product from XML template
topicmeta.shortdesc: You can export a visualized product to an XML template. Use these steps to import an XML template from a visualized product defined in another instance of GenericCenter.

topic.title: Start policy submission for visualized product

shortdesc.p: A submission for a visualized product lets you navigate through the screens of a policy submission. You can add coverages, specify policy details, quote, bind, and issue a policy.

topicmeta.navtitle: Start policy submission for visualized product
topicmeta.linktext: Start policy submission for visualized product
topicmeta.shortdesc: A submission for a visualized product lets you navigate through the screens of a policy submission. You can add coverages, specify policy details, quote, bind, and issue a policy.

shortdesc.p: You can update an existing visualized product by modifying its XMind mind map and then bringing those changes into APD.

topicmeta.shortdesc: You can update an existing visualized product by modifying its XMind mind map and then bringing those changes into APD.

topic.title: Export visualized product to XML template

shortdesc.p: From APD, export a visualized product to an XML template file.

topicmeta.navtitle: Export visualized product to XML template
topicmeta.linktext: Export visualized product to XML template
topicmeta.shortdesc: From APD, export a visualized product to an XML template file.

topic.title: Adding risk details in visualize mode

topicmeta.navtitle: Adding risk details in visualize mode
topicmeta.linktext: Adding risk details in visualize mode

topic.title: Create risk object types directly in APD

shortdesc.p: You can add new risk object types, including location risk objects.

topicmeta.navtitle: Create risk object types directly in APD
topicmeta.linktext: Create risk object types directly in APD
topicmeta.shortdesc: You can add new risk object types, including location risk objects.

topic.title: Add new categories to risk objects

shortdesc.p: You can add new coverage categories, coverages, and terms for an existing risk object directly in APD.

topicmeta.navtitle: Add new categories to risk objects
topicmeta.linktext: Add new categories to risk objects
topicmeta.shortdesc: You can add new coverage categories, coverages, and terms for an existing risk object directly in APD.

shortdesc.p: After you import the mind map into APD, view the APD screens for a schedule.

topicmeta.shortdesc: After you import the mind map into APD, view the APD screens for a schedule.

topic.title: Extract existence rules from mind map

shortdesc.p: You can extract the existence rules from a mind map into HTML format. In the mind map, existence rules are contained in Notes on topics.

topicmeta.navtitle: Extract existence rules from mind map
topicmeta.linktext: Extract existence rules from mind map
topicmeta.shortdesc: You can extract the existence rules from a mind map into HTML format. In the mind map, existence rules are contained in Notes on topics.

topic.title: Add default and minimum and maximum values

shortdesc.p: You can add default and minimum and maximum values to most fields on Advanced Product Designer screens.

topicmeta.navtitle: Add default and minimum and maximum values
topicmeta.linktext: Add default and minimum and maximum values
topicmeta.shortdesc: You can add default and minimum and maximum values to most fields on Advanced Product Designer screens.

shortdesc.p: Use existence rules to specify whether a product attribute is captured, derived, hidden, or unavailable by default. You can also specify variants to this rule.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Use existence rules to specify whether a product attribute is captured, derived, hidden, or unavailable by default. You can also specify variants to this rule.

p.span: Describes how to manage a GenericCenter system. The intended readers are system administrators responsible for managing security, backups, logging, importing user data, or application monitoring.

shortdesc.ph: Describes how to manage a GenericCenter system. The intended readers are system administrators responsible for managing security, backups, logging, importing user data, or application monitoring.

p.span: Describes new features and changes from prior GenericCenter versions. Intended readers are business users and system administrators who want an overview of new features and changes to features. Consult the “Release Notes Archive” part of this document for changes in prior maintenance releases.

shortdesc.ph: Describes new features and changes from prior GenericCenter versions. Intended readers are business users and system administrators who want an overview of new features and changes to features.
